about: I am a recent B.Tech graduate in Information Technology with a strong foundation in programming and a passion for building impactful web applications. My interest in full-stack development grew through hands-on experience during internships and college projects. I enjoy turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs. My final-year project involved creating an AI-powered interview preparation platform using Flask and SQLite. Apart from coding, I love learning new technologies and improving my skills in languages like Python, C, and SQL. I'm driven by curiosity, and I aim to grow into a professional developer who contributes meaningfully to the tech community.
